title: Metrology Support Services logo
content:
Hi friends

Please help me ID the font used for Metrology Support Services logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105818im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Msslogo-gold_small_6712.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
The lower case letters are [Pristina](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105818/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pristina/). The initials might be Mistral, gotta check.

- Mike Yanega

The S is from Pristina too.

- Mike Yanega
